text:
"GW #Pharma has developed cannabis-based drugs for multiple sclerosis and epilepsy, and now….cancer. That’s right. Big Pharma now holds the #patent for #cancer treatment using 😳 #cannabis. Let. That. Sink. In. For. A. Moment. 🌍🌎🌏 There it is. 👍🏻💰🤑 

#Health is NOT Pharma☠️ https://t.co/xQs67dZP4r
